蓩字的基本解释

蓩
mǎo
〔蓩蓩〕茂盛。
古书上说的一种毒草。

蓩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mǎo］
［《廣韻》武道切，上晧，明。］
见“蓩蓩”。

蓩字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蓩； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1052第08
【唐韻】【集韻】?武道切，音媢。菤耳也。　又【類篇】葆也。　又【博雅】茂也。【魏武帝·樂府】乗雲駕龍，鬰何蓩蓩。　又【集韻】毒草名。葶䔭也。　又地名。【後漢·劉?傳】遣李松會朱鮪，與赤眉戰于蓩鄕。　又【廣韻】莫卜切，音木。【集韻】亡遇切，音務。?作毒草釋。

蓩字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蓩字的起名意思

暂无。

Yin
mǎo
〔蓩蓩] luxuriant.
A kind of poisonous weed in ancient books.

[①]［mǎo］
["Guangyun" martial arts cut, Shanghao, Ming. ]
See "蓩蓩".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Characters] 　蓩; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1052 Page 08
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Wudao cut, sound girl. The ears are also.　[Classes] Bao Ye.　[Bo Ya] Mao Ye. 【Wei Wudi·Yuefu】Riding on the clouds to drive the dragon, He Lingling.　[Jiyun] The name of poisonous weed. Ting Nian also.　Also place name. [Later Han·Liu? Biography] Li Song will be sent to Zhu Tian to fight with the red eyebrows.　[Guangyun] Mobuqie, sound wood. [Jiyun] Death meets death, music affairs. ? For poisonous herb release.
